Functions.desc: Returns the absolute value of the specified value

Functions.desc: Returns the cosine of the specified value

Functions.desc: Counts the number of bits (per component) set in the input integer

Functions.label: clip
Functions.desc: Discards the current pixel if the specified value is less than zero

Functions.label: ddx
Functions.desc: Returns the partial derivative of the specified value with respect to the screen-space x-coordinate

Functions.label: ddx_coarse
Functions.desc: Computes a low precision partial derivative with respect to the screen-space x-coordinate

Functions.label: ddx_fine
Functions.desc: Computes a high precision partial derivative with respect to the screen-space x-coordinate

Functions.label: ddy
Functions.desc: Returns the partial derivative of the specified value with respect to the screen-space y-coordinate

Functions.desc: Computes a low precision partial derivative with respect to the screen-space y-coordinate

Functions.label: ddy_fine
Functions.desc: Computes a high precision partial derivative with respect to the screen-space y-coordinate

Functions.label: fwidth
Functions.desc: Returns the absolute value of the partial derivatives of the specified value

Functions.label: EvaluateAttributeAtCentroid
Functions.desc: Evaluates at the pixel centroid

Functions.label: EvaluateAttributeAtSample
Functions.desc: Evaluates at the indexed sample location

Functions.label: EvaluateAttributeSnapped
Functions.desc: Evaluates at the pixel centroid with an offset

parameters.name: offset
parameters.desc: A 2D offset from the pixel center using a 16x16 grid

Functions.label: GetRenderTargetSampleCount
Functions.desc: Gets the number of samples for a render target

Functions.label: GetRenderTargetSamplePosition
Functions.desc: Gets the sampling position (x,y) for a given sample index

Functions.label: WaveGetLaneCount
Functions.desc: Returns the number of lanes in a wave on this architecture

Functions.label: WaveGetLaneIndex
Functions.desc: Returns the index of the current lane within the current wave

Functions.label: WaveIsFirstLane
Functions.desc: Returns true only for the active lane in the current wave with the smallest index

Functions.label: WaveActiveAnyTrue
Functions.desc: Returns true if the expression is true in any of the active lanes in the current wave

Functions.label: WaveActiveAllTrue
Functions.desc: Returns true if the expression is true in all active lanes in the current wave

Functions.label: WaveActiveBallot
Functions.desc: Returns a uint4 containing a bitmask of the evaluation of the Boolean expression for all active lanes in the current wav

Functions.label: WaveReadLaneFirst
Functions.desc: Returns the value of the expression for the active lane of the current wave with the smallest index

Functions.label: WaveReadLaneAt
Functions.desc: Returns the value of the expression for the given lane index within the specified wave

parameters.name: laneIndex
parameters.desc: The index of the lane for which the *expr* result will be returned

Functions.label: WaveActiveAllEqual
Functions.desc: Returns true if the expression is the same for every active lane in the current wave (and thus uniform across it)

parameters.name: expr
parameters.desc: The expression to evaluate. `` can be a basic scalar, vector, or matrix type

Functions.label: WaveActiveCountBits
Functions.desc: Counts the number of boolean variables which evaluate to true across all active lanes in the current wave, and replicate

parameters.name: bBit
parameters.desc: The boolean variables to evaluate. Providing an explicit true Boolean value returns the number of active lanes

Functions.label: WaveActiveSum
Functions.desc: Sums up the value of the expression across all active lanes in the current wave and replicates it to all lanes in the cu

Functions.label: WaveActiveProduct
Functions.desc: Multiplies the values of the expression together across all active lanes in the current wave and replicates it back to a

Functions.label: WaveActiveMin
Functions.desc: Returns the minimum value of the expression across all active lanes in the current wave replicates it back to all active

Functions.label: WaveActiveMax
Functions.desc: Returns the maximum value of the expression across all active lanes in the current wave and replicates it back to all ac

Functions.label: WaveActiveBitAnd
Functions.desc: Returns the bitwise AND of all the values of the expression across all active lanes in the current wave and replicates i

Functions.label: WaveActiveBitOr
Functions.desc: Returns the bitwise OR of all the values of the expression across all active lanes in the current wave and replicates it

Functions.label: WaveActiveBitXor
Functions.desc: Returns the bitwise XOR of all the values of the expression across all active lanes in the current wave and replicates i

Functions.label: WavePrefixCountBits
Functions.desc: Returns the sum of all the specified boolean variables set to true across all active lanes with indices smaller than the current lane

Functions.label: WavePrefixSum
Functions.desc: Returns the sum of all of the values in the active lanes with smaller indices than this one

Functions.label: WavePrefixProduct
Functions.desc: Returns the product of all of the values in the active lanes in this wave with indices less than this lane

Functions.label: QuadReadLaneAt
Functions.desc: Returns the specified source value from the lane identified by the lane ID within the current quad

parameters.name: quadLaneID
parameters.desc: The lane ID; this will be a value from 0 to 3

Functions.label: QuadReadAcrossDiagonal
Functions.desc: Returns the specified local value which is read from the diagonally opposite lane in this quad

Functions.label: QuadReadAcrossX
Functions.desc: Returns the specified source value read from the other lane in this quad in the X direction

Functions.label: QuadReadAcrossY
Functions.desc: Returns the specified source value read from the other lane in this quad in the Y direction
